oai_dc:dc.dc:title: First Church of Christ Dedication Stone
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Rectangular marble dedication stone embedded in brick church facade bearing the words "Remodeled November 3, 1912"

This dedication stone which appears to have come from another structure is now embedded in the brick wall of the Hasson Street Christian Church suggesting a historical connection with the First Church of Christ.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
